name: Crafting Nonmagical Items
description: A character who has proficiency with the appropriate artisan's tools can craft nonmagical items during downtime. The character must have the raw materials and tools needed.
requirements: Proficiency with the appropriate artisan's tools
Raw materials worth half the item's market value

progressPerDay.description: For every day of downtime spent crafting, a character can craft items with a total market value of up to 5 GP. The character must spend raw materials worth half of that market value.

multipleCharacters: Multiple characters can combine their efforts to craft a single item, provided they all have proficiency with the requisite tools and are working together in the same location. Each character contributes 5 GP worth of crafting progress per day.
notes: While crafting, a character can maintain a modest lifestyle without paying the normal daily cost. Characters with higher lifestyle expectations must pay the difference.
